pages.title: Context Core
pages.text: The context core is the key to making spells. After throwing a context core on the ground, the core will rise a few blocks in height and then expanded. After that, we need to throw some mana material into it. The attribute of the spell depend on the type and quantity of the material.

pages.title: Expanded Context Core
pages.text: You can hit several times to recover the core, or you can right-click the core to drop all the materials inside

After the materials in the core reach our satisfaction, we can right-click the core with the wand to complete the core compilation this time, and the core will be compressed back to its original size and become a magick context.

pages.title: Magick Context
pages.text: The attribute of spell depends on the value of this thing, and compressing the context core into a magick context is an irreversible operation.
